extension.description: SRF Play TV allows you to watch the content from the video library of Swiss Radio and Television (SRF).
Mit SRF Play TV können Sie den Inhalt der SRF Play Videobibliothek des Schweizer Fernsehens anschauen.
extension.disclaimer: Some content is geo-blocked and only available in Switzerland.
Einige Inhalte sind nur in der Schweiz verfügbar.

extension.news:
v1.0.0 (2018-04-24) - Add support for SRF.ch livestreams. - Add support for Live TV (SRF 1, SRF 2, SRF info). - Choose folders to appear in the main menu.
v0.9.3 (2018-04-22) - Add date picker for choosing shows by date.
v0.9.2 (2018-04-19) - Move selection of favourite shows into the addon settings. - Enable segments for most recent favourite shows.
